definition: many/much/often/a lot of/numerous/more/in excess/how (to what extent)/multi-/Taiwan pr. [duo2] when it means "how"
elegant and graceful posture/splendid, full of content
multicolored splendor (of fireworks, bright lights etc)

sentences.english: You feel you have something more to live for.
sentences.chinese: 你感觉生活变得更有意义和丰富多彩。

sentences.english: Black and white was changed into multi-colour by her.
sentences.chinese: 她把世界变得多姿多彩。

sentences.english: Coeducation gives kids the opportunity of growing in an atmosphere of diversity.
sentences.chinese: 男女同校为孩子提供了一种丰富多彩的成长环境。

sentences.english: The world itself is colorful and varied, and it is impossible to have one mode.
sentences.chinese: 世界本来就是富厚多彩的，不有可能只有一种模式。

sentences.english: There are several ways to soak up Oahu’s colorful history.
sentences.chinese: 了解瓦胡岛的多彩历史有多种方式。

sentences.english: The Chinese life is colorful with many interesting folkways.
sentences.chinese: 中国人的生活多姿多彩，有许多很有意思的民俗。

sentences.english: Tourmaline is the most multi-colored natural gemstone in the world.
sentences.chinese: 碧玺是世界上最多彩的自然宝石。

sentences.english: It's much more varied.It's much more complex.
sentences.chinese: 它更加的多样化，更多彩也更复杂。

sentences.english: Wildflowers of different colors brighten the rocky land.
sentences.chinese: 多彩的野花装点了这个多石的地方。

sentences.english: Colorfully lit high- risers give off dazzling light in the darkness.
sentences.chinese: 多姿多彩的高楼大厦，在夜色中绚烂夺目。

sentences.english: The abundance of linguistic culture leads to diversifications in the contents and forms of allusions.
sentences.chinese: 丰富的语言文化造就了典故语丰富多彩的内容和形式。

sentences.english: I think our life is colourful.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得我们的生活丰富多彩。

sentences.english: The best workers are well-rounded professionals with full lives, in and out of the office.
sentences.chinese: 最好的员工在职场内外都有丰富多彩的生活。

sentences.english: The richness of mood determines the colorfulness of music.
sentences.chinese: “情”的丰富复杂，决定了“乐”的多姿多彩。

sentences.english: 90 start bell-bottomed trousers' type also becomes colorful.
sentences.chinese: 90年代开始喇叭裤的种类也变得多姿多彩。

definition: all the colors in profusion (idiom); a garish display
see 五彩繽紛|五彩缤纷[wu3 cai3 bin1 fen1]
elegant and graceful posture/splendid, full of content
bright and multicolored/of rich variety/(fig.) dazzling/glitzy
lit. flowing light and overflowing color/brilliant lights and vibrant colors (idiom)
